reviewText:
As with every Ray Vander Laan video, the excellence of the photography, the archeological background, and the Love for the Lord and the Word comes through in his inimitable style.
Always informative, always exciting, and always reverend and instructive in the Word and the relationship of the place being visited.  You, your Bible Class, your Church Group will benefit and enjoy this marvelous video,
Great Biblical teaching and having the DVD recorded on-site makes the teaching especially alive and easier to remember.  The background shots of the actual sites are tremendous.
